mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, TB.POST_ID,TB.TITLE, TB.WRITER_ID, TB.GOOD_NUMBER,TB.POSTING_DATE FROM( SELECT * FROM POST PO JOIN BOARD BO ON (PO.BOARD_ID = BO.BOARD_ID) WHERE PO.BOARD_ID = 1 ORDER BY GOOD_NUMBER DESC) TB )WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#{page_num} - 1) * 2 + 1) AND (#{page_num} * 2)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, TB.POST_ID,TB.TITLE, TB.WRITER_ID, TB.GOOD_NUMBER,TB.POSTING_DATE FROM( SELECT * FROM POST PO JOIN BOARD BO ON (PO.BOARD_ID = BO.BOARD_ID) WHERE PO.BOARD_ID = 1 ORDER BY GOOD_NUMBER DESC) TB )WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#{page_num} - 1) * 8 + 1) AND (#{page_num} * 8)
